name: Super Extra Console Dungeon Game
description:
Super Console Dungeon Game is a simple text based console dungeon crawler for Windows. It started out as an extra credit project for my beginning programming class. I thought I'd post the project online, and in the future I hope to post a tutorial outlining basic coding for games.

In Super Console Dungeon Game, the goal is to enter the dungeon and find as much treasure as possible. Falling in a trap will return you to the first floor and failing to defeat monsters will cause you to loose treasure.

*The further you are in the dungeon, the less treasure you loose.

The game will go on forever if you keep playing, so enjoy! :)
